description:
Caiman and Nikaido take part in the annual Night of the Living Dead. But before they can finish their mission, Shin and Noi show up to finish them.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Night of the Dead: Duel! In Front of the Main Department Store
Shisha no Yoru .. Kettou! Chuuou Departo mae ..
死者の夜――決闘! 中央デパート前――
